characters.story: The thread stands for to discontinue, asking "Jyueh, should we break off?" curiously!
The tongue stands for sweet, singing "Gahn!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The tree stands for such and such, whispering "Moh" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Picture his-hers-its-theirs taking form - it asks "Chee? Whose?" with vivid energy!
Like a moon, this character means period of time and sings "Chee!"!
The strokes unite to show base, singing "Jee!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents sphinx, singing "Suh!" cheerfully!
This character represents tremendously, shouting "Shun!" sharply!
Like a shellfish, this character means expensive and shouts "Gway!"!
"Yee, did we lose it?" The expensive item on the road was left behind - bequeathed and lost!
A striking symbol for dance that whispers "Woo" softly - a vivid image to remember!
See how the fire forms nothing? It asks "Woo? Lacking?" curiously!
See how the hand forms to comfort? It whispers "Foo" softly!
This character represents moreover, whispering "Chyeh" softly!
An striking symbol for older sister that whispers "Jyeh" softly!
See how the thread forms group? It whispers "Dzoo" softly - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show ancestor, whispering "Dzoo" softly!
